A discovery of fire and salt discovering many secret mysteries, as well philosophicall, as theologicall. Traicté du feu et du sel. English Vigenère, Blaise de, 1523-1596. Stephens, Edward.
[4], 162 p.
Printed by Richard Cotes, and are to be sold by Andrew Crooke ..., London : 1649.
Translation of the author's: Traicté du feu et du sel. Dedication signed by the translator: Edvvard Stephens. Imperfect: faded and creased, with some loss of print. Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the Bodleian Library.
=======

[4], 162 p.

Translation of the author's: Traicté du feu et du sel. Dedication signed by the translator: Edvvard Stephens. Imperfect: faded and creased, with some loss of print. Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the Bodleian Library.
